name: Beer Caesar
description: Also known as Red Beer, the Mighty Baesar and Bloody Beer, this is a refreshing twist on the classic Caesar. Don’t be shy with the garnish – use pickled carrots, asparagus, beans, try fresh cucumber wedges, or make it a meal with grilled shrimp or beef skewers.
preparation: Pour Caesar Rim Trimmer™ into a saucer. Rim two glasses with a lime wedge. Dip rims into Trimmer and twist to coat evenly.
Fill glasses with ice. Divide beer between glasses, then pour in Clamato. Shake in dashes of hot sauce and Worcestershire sauce.
Grind Pepper over top and garnish with lime wedges.
